titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the employment of social workers in the Veterans Health Administration on a fee basis.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6860-6861)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 6/14/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to employ social workers within the Veterans Health Administration of the Department of Veterans Affairs, without regard to civil service or classification rules and regulations.
